titleStmt.title: The plain mans path-way to heaven wherein every man may clearly see whether he shall be saved or damned. / Set forth dialogue-wise for the better understanding of the simple, by Arthur Dent, preacher of the word of God at South-Shoobery in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja. Young, for G. Lathum, in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bishops-head,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print faded with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the National Library of Wales.
